archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Define Inter-Agreement Relationship
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Define relationship(s) with other agreement(s), such as a group of service level agreements.

properties.value: Define Inter-Agreement Relationship defines relationship(s) with other agreement(s). For example a service level agreement for an end-to-end service may be related to individual service level agreements with other parties who provide components of the service; or relating a purchase agreements with the applicable service level agreement(s).
